mapper.insert: insert into sss_customer (cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_gen, brithday, tel, address, comment) values (#{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerGen,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update sss_customer set customer_name = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_psd = #{customerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_gen = #{customerGen,jdbcType=CHAR}, brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_gen, brithday, tel, address, comment from sss_customer where cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cu_id, customer_name, customer_psd, customer_gen, brithday, tel, address, comment from sss_customer
